notes:
Great news! The package `donfig` is [officially supported](https://pyodide.org/en/stable/usage/packages-in-pyodide.html) in the latest Pyodide release used by PyScript.

To use it in PyScript simply add it to the `packages` section of your TOML configuration like this:

```
packages = ["donfig" ]
```

Or if you're using a JSON configuration, like this:

```
{
    packages: ["donfig"]
 }
```

Read more about using packages in PyScript [in our documentation](https://docs.pyscript.net/latest/user-guide/configuration/#packages).

Specifically, the following versions of the package are available for the following Pyodide releases:

Pyodide version: package name (version) (PyScript Version)

* 0.29.0: donfig (0.8.1.post1) ([PyScript 2025.11.1](https://pyscript.net/releases/2025.11.1/))
* 0.28.3: donfig (0.8.1.post1)
* 0.28.2: donfig (0.8.1.post1)
* 0.28.1: donfig (0.8.1.post1) ([PyScript 2025.8.1](https://pyscript.net/releases/2025.8.1/))
* 0.28.0: donfig (0.8.1.post1)
summary: Python package for configuring a python package
